name: AWS DynamoDB
description: The Sumo Logic App for Amazon DynamoDB is a unified logs and metrics (ULM) App which provides operational insights into your DynamoDB solution. The App includes Dashboards that allow you to monitor key metrics and view the throttle events, errors, latency, and help you plan the capacity of your DynamoDB solution.

children.name: 1. AWS DynamoDB - Capacity Planning
children.description: See the details of your DynamoDB capacity including the provisioned read/write consumed, read/write throttle events, and throttled requests.
children.title: 1. AWS DynamoDB - Capacity Planning

queries.queryString: namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=ProvisionedReadCapacityUnits Statistic=Maximum | avg by entity
namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=ConsumedReadCapacityUnits Statistic=Maximum | avg by entity
(#B/#A)*100 along entity
namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=ProvisionedWriteCapacityUnits Statistic=Maximum | avg by entity
namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=ConsumedWriteCapacityUnits Statistic=Maximum | avg by entity
100 *(#B/#A) along entity
namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=ProvisionedReadCapacityUnits Statistic=Maximum | avg by entity, GlobalSecondaryIndexName
namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=ConsumedReadCapacityUnits Statistic=Maximum | avg by entity, GlobalSecondaryIndexName
namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=ProvisionedWriteCapacityUnits Statistic=Maximum | avg by entity, GlobalSecondaryIndexName
namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=ConsumedWriteCapacityUnits Statistic=Maximum | avg by entity, GlobalSecondaryIndexName

panels.title: Throttled Read Requests by Table and Operation

queries.queryString: namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=ThrottledRequests Statistic=sum (operation=*get* or operation=*scan* or operation=*query*)| sum by entity, operation

panels.title: Throttled Read Requests by Table and Operation

queries.queryString: namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=ThrottledRequests Statistic=sum (operation=*get* or operation=*scan* or operation=*query*) | avg by entity, operation

panels.title: Throttled Write Requests by Table and Operation

queries.queryString: namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=ThrottledRequests Statistic=sum (operation=*update* or operation=*put* or operation=*delete* or operation=*write*)| sum by entity, operation

panels.title: Throttled Write Requests by Table and Operation

queries.queryString: namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=ThrottledRequests Statistic=sum (operation=*update* or operation=*put* or operation=*delete* or operation=*write*)| sum by entity, operation
namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=ReadThrottleEvents Statistic=sum | avg by entity
namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=WriteThrottleEvents Statistic=sum | avg by entity
region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=AccountMaxReads Statistic=Average | sum
region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=AccountMaxTableLevelReads Statistic=Average | sum
region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=AccountMaxWrites Statistic=Average | sum
region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=AccountMaxTableLevelWrites Statistic=Average | sum

children.name: 1. AWS DynamoDB - Overview
children.description: See the overview of your DynamoDB environment including the events, errors, requests, users, and latency.
children.title: 1. AWS DynamoDB - Overview

queries.queryString: namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} | count by entity
namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} metric=AccountProvisionedWriteCapacityUtilization Statistic=Average | sum
namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} metric=UserErrors Statistic=SampleCount | avg
namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} metric=SystemErrors Statistic=SampleCount | avg
namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} metric=ConditionalCheckFailedRequests Statistic=SampleCount | avg
namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} metric=TransactionConflict Statistic=SampleCount | avg

namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} account={{account}} entity={{entity}} metric=SuccessfulRequestLatency Statistic=Average (operation=*get* or operation=*scan* or operation=*query*) | avg by entity, operation

namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} account={{account}} entity={{entity}} metric=SuccessfulRequestLatency Statistic=Average (operation=*update* or operation=*put* or operation=*delete* or operation=*write*) | avg by entity, operation

panels.title: Number of Successful Requests by Table and Operation Name

queries.queryString: namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} account={{account}} entity={{entity}} metric=SuccessfulRequestLatency Statistic=SampleCount | avg by entity, operation
namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} metric=UserErrors Statistic=SampleCount | avg by region
namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} metric=SystemErrors Statistic=SampleCount | avg by region
namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} metric=ConditionalCheckFailedRequests Statistic=SampleCount | avg by region

$$cloudtrail account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName" as event_name, Region, entity, src_ip, user nodrop
| where Region matches "{{region}}"
| timeslice 1h
| count by event_name, _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column event_name

$$cloudtrail account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\"" errorCode errorMessage
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as event_name, Region, entity, src_ip, user, error_code, error_msg nodrop
| where Region matches "{{region}}"
| count by error_code, error_msg, event_name, user, src_ip

$$cloudtrail account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName" as event_name, Region, entity, src_ip, user nodrop
| where Region matches "{{region}}"
| count as count by user
| sort count 
| limit 10
namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} metric=AccountProvisionedReadCapacityUtilization Statistic=Average | sum

children.name: 2. AWS DynamoDB  - Latency and Errors
children.description: See the details of errors and latency of your DynamoDB including the user error, system error, failed request, and latency.
children.title: 2. AWS DynamoDB  - Latency and Errors

queries.queryString: namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} account={{account}} entity={{entity}} metric=SuccessfulRequestLatency Statistic=Average (operation=*get* or operation=*scan* or operation=*query*) | avg by entity, operation

namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} account={{account}} entity={{entity}} metric=SuccessfulRequestLatency Statistic=Average (operation=*update* or operation=*put* or operation=*delete* or operation=*write*) | avg by entity, operation
namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} metric=UserErrors Statistic=SampleCount | avg by region
namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} metric=SystemErrors Statistic=SampleCount | avg by region

namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} account={{account}} entity={{entity}} metric=SuccessfulRequestLatency Statistic=Average (operation=*get* or operation=*scan* or operation=*query*) | avg by entity, operation

namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} account={{account}} entity={{entity}} metric=SuccessfulRequestLatency Statistic=Average (operation=*update* or operation=*put* or operation=*delete* or operation=*write*) | avg by entity, operation
namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=ConditionalCheckFailedRequests Statistic=SampleCount | avg by entity
namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} metric=TransactionConflict Statistic=SampleCount | avg

children.name: 3. AWS DynamoDB - Events
children.description: See the details on events in your DynamoDB including the location, users, errors, updates, creations, and deletions to tables.
children.title: 3. AWS DynamoDB - Events

queries.queryString:
$$cloudtrail account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName" as event_name, Region, entity, src_ip, user
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| count by event_name

$$cloudtrail account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName" as event_name, Region, entity, src_ip, user
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| timeslice 1h
| count by event_name, _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column event_name 
| fillmissing timeslice (1h)

$$cloudtrail account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\"" errorCode errorMessage
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as event_name, Region, entity, src_ip, user, error_code, error_msg
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| count

$$cloudtrail account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\"" errorCode errorMessage
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as event_name, Region, entity, src_ip, user, error_code, error_msg
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| count by entity
| sort by _count
| limit 5

$$cloudtrail account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName" as event_name, Region, entity, src_ip, user
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| count as count by user
| sort count 
| limit 10

$$cloudtrail account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\"" errorCode errorMessage
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as event_name, Region, entity, src_ip, user, error_code, error_msg
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| count as Count by error_code, error_msg, event_name, user, src_ip
| sort by Count
| limit 20

$$cloudtrail account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\"" CreateTable
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName", "requestParameters.keySchema", "requestParameters.attributeDefinitions", "userAgent", "responseElements.tableDescription.provisionedThroughput" as event_name, Region, entity, src_ip, user, table_schema, attribute_definition, user_agent, provisioned_throughput
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| count by event_name, entity, table_schema, attribute_definition, provisioned_throughput, user, region, src_ip

$$cloudtrail account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\"" UpdateTable !(errorCode)
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName" as event_name, Region, entity, src_ip, user
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| count by event_name, entity, user, region, src_ip

$$cloudtrail account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\"" DeleteTable
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName", "userIdentity.sessionContext.attributes.mfaAuthenticated" as event_name, Region, entity, src_ip, user, mfa_authentication
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(entity) matches "{{entity}}" 
| count by event_name, entity, user, region, src_ip, mfa_authentication

$$cloudtrail account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\"" UpdateTimeToLive
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName", "requestParameters", "responseElements" as event_name, Region, entity, src_ip, user, req_params, resp_elements
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| count by event_name, region, user, src_ip, req_params, resp_elements

$$cloudtrail account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName" as event_name, Region, entity, src_ip, user
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| count by src_ip
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = src_ip
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code

children.name: 4. AWS DynamoDB - Threat Intel
children.description: See the details of IP threats including the count, location, and highly malicious IP threats.
children.title: 4. AWS DynamoDB - Threat Intel

queries.queryString:
$$cloudtrail account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName" as event_name, Region, entity, ip_address, user
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| where ip_address != "0.0.0.0" and ip_address != "127.0.0.1"
| count as ip_count by ip_address
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=ip_address 
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name 
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| where  type="ip_address" and !isNull(malicious_confidence)
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as Actor
| sum (ip_count) as threat_count

$$cloudtrail account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName" as event_name, Region, entity, ip_address, user
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| where ip_address != "0.0.0.0" and ip_address != "127.0.0.1"
| timeslice 5m
| count as ip_count by ip_address, _sourceCategory, entity
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=ip_address 
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name 
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| where  type="ip_address" and malicious_confidence="high"
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as Actor
| sum (ip_count) as threat_count by ip_address, malicious_confidence, entity, Actor,  _sourceCategory, label_name
| sort by threat_count

$$cloudtrail account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName" as event_name, Region, entity, ip_address, user
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| where ip_address != "0.0.0.0" and ip_address != "127.0.0.1"
| count as ip_count by ip_address, _sourceCategory
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=ip_address 
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name 
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| where  type="ip_address" and !isNull(malicious_confidence)
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as Actor
| sum (ip_count) as threat_count by ip_address, malicious_confidence, Actor,  _sourceCategory, label_name
| sort by threat_count

$$cloudtrail account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName" as event_name, Region, entity, ip_address, user
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| where ip_address != "0.0.0.0" and ip_address != "127.0.0.1"
| count as ip_count by ip_address, _sourceCategory
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=ip_address 
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name 
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| where  type="ip_address"
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as Actor
| count by malicious_confidence

$$cloudtrail account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName" as event_name, Region, entity, ip_address, user
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| where ip_address != "0.0.0.0" and ip_address != "127.0.0.1"
| timeslice 5m
| count as ip_count by ip_address, _sourceCategory, entity
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=ip_address 
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name 
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| where  type="ip_address" and malicious_confidence="high"
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as Actor
| sum (ip_count) as threat_count by entity
| sort by threat_count

$$cloudtrail account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName" as event_name, Region, entity, ip_address, user
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| where ip_address != "0.0.0.0" and ip_address != "127.0.0.1"
| count as ip_count by ip_address
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=ip_address 
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name 
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| where  type="ip_address" and !isNull(malicious_confidence)
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as Actor
| count by ip_address
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = ip_address
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count
